transArray.content: The hotel is very close to the subway station. There are some places for leisure and fitness downstairs. The facilities are good. The breakfast is not rich, but it is edible. The hotel room is relatively small and cannot be opened. After cleaning the floor every day, it is still black with a napkin. There will be hairs on the ground, and there are many places where the design is not convenient, but the decoration of the room is still quite new
